handoffs.directive: Merge 7 completed research worktree branches into master, then assess findings and determine next steps for P1 Trace Semantics IR investigation
Execute the two unblocked synthesis beads (athena-ywn: cross-framework trace synthesis, athena-tyt: comparative IR synthesis) to advance toward Step 5 (draft candidate IR schemas)
Continue the P1 Trace Semantics IR investigation: plan and implement Step 3b (requirements refinement with coverage matrix)
Plan and implement Step 5a: Draft candidate IR schemas for ATHENA Trace Semantics Engine
Design a prompt for Codex to implement Step 5b: LEL IR prototype on OpenMM traces
Close the 5 open threads from Step 5a using the validated LEL prototype as empirical evidence
Push trace semantics into Phase 2 prototyping: add by_id index, implement CausalOverlay, implement R14 confounder query
Step 9 — a GROMACS adapter for cross-framework generalization
VASP adapter first, then hidden confounder litmus test
